Lansing.Franklin Avenue Presbyterian Church:
Franklin Avenue Presbyterian Church (also known as North Presbyterian Church) is a historic church at 108 W. Grand River Avenue in Lansing, Michigan.
It was built in 1916 and added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1988. In 2010 the congregation merged into Westminster Presbyterian Church due to shrinking attendance, and the building was bought by The Epicenter of Worship Church.
